para.text: BrightstarDB already has many great features and can be used in a wide variety of application scenarios. This roadmap provides some insight into the planned features for future releases.

li.text: Mobile variant. BrightstarDB is ideal for developing data intensive phone apps.
Sharded variant. BrightstarDB is architected to work in a shared-nothing architecture. This will be as multiple services on single machine but also multiple partitions across many machines.
OData support. Exposing BrightstarDB entity models as OData.
